Package org.easybatch.xml

This package contains Xml processing support classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    XmlBatchReader
    Reads Xml records in batches.
    XmlRecord
    A record in a xml file.
    XmlRecordCompactor
    Compacts a Xml record payload.
    XmlRecordMapper<P>
    A record mapper that maps xml records to domain objects annotated with JAXB annotations.
    XmlRecordMarshaller
    Marshals an object to XML using JAXB.
    XmlRecordReader
    A record reader that reads xml records from an xml stream.
    XmlWrapperTagWriter
    Utility class to write an Xml declaration and a configurable wrapper tag to an output stream.

Package org.easybatch.xml Description

This package contains Xml processing support classes.
